fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 107.75 points or 0.55% to settle at 19,753.80. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 2.73% to 10.41. HDFC Bank, Piramal Enterprises and Infosys were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
